ivory.ptc.data

Class AnchorTextTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • ivory.ptc.data.AnchorTextTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<AnchorTextTarget>, Iterable<Integer>, Writable, WritableComparable<AnchorTextTarget>

    public class AnchorTextTarget
extends Object
implements WritableComparable<AnchorTextTarget>, Iterable<Integer>
    Data structure that holds a target document along with a list of (source) documents that point to the target document. In addition, a weight field is associated with the target document if necessary. The iterator method iterates over the source documents that point to the target document.
    Author:
    Nima Asadi

      • setSources

        public void setSources(ArrayListOfIntsWritable sources)
        Resets the source list to the given list. Please note that this method removes the existing list with the given parameter; i.e., the source list will be reset and re-initialized.
        Parameters:
        sources - Source documents to be initialized with.
